The simulation module
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. module:: simulation

Functions in this module are accessed by importing ``pydsm`` and
looking in the ``pydsm.simulation`` module.

This module provides some functions for the simulation of of ΔΣ
modulators.  Currently this is just an auxiliary entry point to the
simulation functions in :doc:`the delsig module of PyDSM
<delsig-module>`.

.. automodule:: pydsm.simulation

.. autofunction:: pydsm.simulation.simulateDSM
